post:

All plans - VZ VPS Hosting | WebHorizon
coupon code - RYZEN.VZ
.
Post your order # to claim double resources.
Justification required for the extra IPv4


F.A.Q.

  1. Refund policy = 24 hours; minimal transaction fee deducted.
  2. Activation time = Instantly (please turn OFF VPN while order)
  3. How to claim = Post order # or make a ticket with billing dept.
  4. Support Available = Support Helpdesk , and Telegram
  5. What is hostname / Invalid hostname = Our system expects hostname in domain format, it can be a dummy domain. for example - sample.com
  6. Support TUN/TAP, FUSE. IPGRE? = YES

Payment Methods =

Crypto payments (no extra fee using CoinPayments)
Card Payments (Stripe processor)
Paypal Payments


Host Specs -
Powerful RYZEN CPU (Gen 2 / Gen 3)
2 x 1TB NVMe/SSD
64GB DD4 RAM
Full 1Gbps port speed - Looking glass speed test
